entries.journal_entry_completion_summary: You have successfully rescued the third Imperial Officer from the Rebel Detainment Facility.
entries.journal_entry_description: Search the Rebel Detainment Facility for the next Imperial Officer being held prisoner.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Defeat Shoma in combat and take his Rebel Officer Uniform.
entries.task01_journal_entry_title: Get the disguise from Caleb Shoma
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Defeat some Rebel Desert Troopers defending the administrative office and hallways.
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: Search the main detention room located at the center of the Detainment Facility. The pilot should be in one of the closer containment bays.
entries.task05_journal_entry_description: Give the officer the disguise you have.
